MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:54pm in order to carry out repairs due to significant damage on our overhead line equipment in the Douglas West area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00am. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11PM on 09 November 2020
